client: DUT MMI - Object programmation and Webdesign
brief: We had 48h to create a responsive website with Vue.js on random picked movie directors. I had Francis Ford Coppola and I was inspired by the themes of his movies.

reflection.text: Francis Ford Coppola often represents war, crime, madness, bloodbath and smart characters in his movies. That is why I used black, white and red for the website.

The website is very light and bright. Yet, I used custom stains to make it less “perfectly white ” and less clean. The design is simple and often the same in order to match with the Vue.js technology and it is more understandable.
We had no instructions about images’ rights so I used free rights illustrations and some posters from Wikipedia. The texts are also coming from Wikipedia because we were restricted in time.
